title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1.37 - Executive Order No. 37: Transfer of title of certain State-owned passenger vehicles from various State departments and agencies to the Office of General Services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1.37 - Executive Order No. 37: Transfer of title of certain State-owned passenger vehicles from various State departments and agencies to the Office of General Services

State Regulations
I, Nelson A. Rockefeller, by virtue of the authority vested
in me by the Constitution and the laws of the State of New York and as Governor
of the State of New York, by Executive Order do hereby authorize the transfer
of title of such State-owned passenger vehicles as may be designated by the

Director of the Budget from the various State departments and agencies to the

Office of General Services. The transfer of title shall take effect in such
manner and at such times as shall be specified by the Director of the

Budget. The Director of the Budget is hereby authorized to review
the assignment and utilization of State-owned automobiles. This Executive Order
further authorizes the Director of the Budget and the Commissioner of General

Services to review and revise the existing policies and procedures for the
procurement, maintenance, use and disposition of State-owned passenger
vehicles. The Director of the Budget is authorized to terminate any permanent
assignments of State-owned passenger vehicles not in accordance with the
revised criteria controlling such assignments. The provisions of this Executive Order shall supersede all
previous directives on this subject and shall continue in force and effect
until amended or revoked. Signed: Nelson A. Rockefeller

Dated: April 9, 1970

Notes
